name: worldspawn-web.github.io
description:
Euro Truck Simulator Mod Storage

The reason for the creation of this project (if it can be called such) is a more competent storage and tracking of the currently used mods, as well as the introduction of accounting for knocked-out (deleted) mods.>

The project is also accompanied by a rating of proven mods and, for some, reviews.

Total amount of tested mods: 53 (+2)

Total amount of active mods: 4 (-1)

Last update: 17.04.2023 (1.47)
